product.title: Winnie the Pooh | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.ingress:
Oh, bother! Everyone’s favorite bear is out of honey—again—and he is looking for a smackerel of something. But when Pooh finds out that Eeyore has lost his tail, he puts his thoughts of honey aside to help his friend. Based on the Disney movie Winnie the Pooh, all the much-loved residents of the Hundred-Acre Wood, including Tigger, Piglet, and Christopher Robin, take part in this endearing tale about a missing tail. And just when things seem to have hit bottom, the bear of very-little brain finds a clever use for words, helping all of his friends in this heartwarming story that’s full of the charm of everyone’s favorite Pooh Bear.

Tie-in Activity: While nothing could replace Eeyore’s original tail, Pooh and his friends came up with some very creative ideas. If you like, you and your child can try to make a new tail for a stuffed animal friend. Use colorful yarn, newspaper, or other safe household items to come up with an imaginative “ending.”
product.text:
Click on one of the tiles above to have more fun with Winnie the Pooh and his friends.
